films.title: The Shawshank Redemption
films.description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: Avengers: Endgame
films.description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble to undo the damage caused by Thanos.

films.title: Interstellar
films.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
films.description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

films.title: Frozen
films.description: When their kingdom becomes trapped in perpetual winter, two sisters team up to save it.

films.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
films.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must band together to stop a fanatical warrior.

films.title: Shazam!
films.description: A boy is given the ability to become an adult superhero in times of need.

films.title: WALL-E
films.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Doctor Strange
films.description: A neurosurgeon embarks on a journey of healing only to be drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

films.title: Inception
films.description: Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a thief with the rare ability to enter people's dreams and steal their secrets from their subconscious.
